mapper.insert: INSERT INTO videos(vurl ,unum ,userid ,vpw, vtitle, gnum) VALUES(#{vurl}, #{unum},#{userid} , #{vpw}, #{vtitle} ,#{gnum})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY ${con} DESC ) AS RN ,bnum ,B.vnum ,B.unum ,B.gnum ,B.userid ,vurl , vtitle ,vpw, A.upcnt, A.downcnt, A.viewcnt FROM boards A INNER JOIN videos B ON A.vnum = B.vnum WHERE B.gnum LIKE CONCAT( #{gnum}, '%') ) C WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE videos SET vurl=#{vurl} , vtitle=#{vtitle}, vpw =#{vpw}, gnum=#{gnum} WHERE vnum= #{vnum} AND unum =#{unum}
